DOC.brief_title: Unmodulated 5 Kilohertz Currents Versus TENS : Effect Pain Thresholds , Tactile Threshold , Nerve Conduction
DOC.detailed_description: In last year several animal experimental study evidence high frequency unmodulated current 5 KHz cause peripheral nerve block . However electric current high frequency usually use treatment pain human interrupt modulate ( i.e . interferential current ) This evidence animal could application pain treatment , characterize overactive nervous system . For reason decide compare effect experimental pain peripheral nerve conduction new electric current versus sham stimulation TENS ( Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ) . The scientific literature transcutaneous electrical stimulation human change nerve conduction / somatosensory threshold focus mainly TENS ( Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ) . Therefore TENS good reference standard compare effect new current .
